com.maxeye.einksdk.wkpaintview.interfaces

接口 PaintViewHolder.Callback

  • 封闭接口:
    PaintViewHolder

    public static interface PaintViewHolder.Callback
    A client may implement this interface to receive information about changes to the surface.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void surfaceChanged(PaintViewHolder holder, int width, int height)
      No use at the moment 当前未使用 This is called immediately after any structural changes (format or size) have been made to the surface.
      void surfaceCreated(PaintViewHolder holder)
      PaintView surface 创建后的回调函数，一般用于加载笔迹\n This is called immediately after the surface is first created.
      void surfaceDestroyed(PaintViewHolder holder)
      已过时。 

    • 方法详细资料

      • surfaceCreated

        void surfaceCreated(PaintViewHolder holder)
        PaintView surface 创建后的回调函数，一般用于加载笔迹\n This is called immediately after the surface is first created. Implementations of this should start up whatever rendering code they desire.
        参数:
        holder - The PaintViewHolder whose surface is being created.

      • surfaceChanged

        void surfaceChanged(PaintViewHolder holder,
                    int width,
                    int height)
        No use at the moment 当前未使用 This is called immediately after any structural changes (format or size) have been made to the surface. You should at this point update the imagery in the PaintView. This method is always called at least once, after surfaceCreated(com.maxeye.einksdk.wkpaintview.interfaces.PaintViewHolder).
        参数:
        holder - The PaintViewHolder whose surface has changed.
        format - The new PixelFormat of the surface.
        width - The new width of the surface.
        height - The new height of the surface.

      • surfaceDestroyed

        @Deprecated
void surfaceDestroyed(PaintViewHolder holder)
        已过时。 
        No use at the moment 当前未使用 This is called immediately before a surface is being destroyed. After returning from this call, you should no longer try to access this surface. If you have a rendering thread that directly accesses the surface, you must ensure that thread is no longer touching the Surface before returning from this function.
        参数:
        holder - The PaintViewHolder whose surface is being destroyed.
